    • getRandomLocation

    • locationExists

      public boolean locationExists​(int x, int y)
      Indicate if the specified location exists in the layout
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of the specified location
      y - Y coordinate of the specified location
      Returns:
      true if the specified location exists in this layout, false otherwise

    • getCardAt

      public Card getCardAt​(int x, int y)
      Returns the card placed at the specified (x, y) coordinates. A null value will be returned if the location doesn't exists or if no card is placed at these coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of the specified location
      y - Y coordinate of the specified location
      Returns:
      The card at the specified coordinates

    • getCardAt

      public Card getCardAt​(Location location)

    • setCardAt

      public boolean setCardAt​(Location location, Card card)

    • placeCard

      public boolean placeCard​(int x, int y, Card card)
      Try to place a card at specified coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate of the specified location
      y - Y coordinate of the specified location
      card - The card to place at these coordinates
      Returns:
      true if the card has been placed, false if it cannot be placed

    • moveCard

      public boolean moveCard​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Move a card on the layout
      Parameters:
      x1 - X coordinate of the card to move
      y1 - Y coordinate of the card to move
      x2 - X coordinate destination
      y2 - Y coordinate destination
      Returns:
      true if the card has been moved, false otherwise

      public abstract void reset()

    • moveHorizontally

      public abstract boolean moveHorizontally​(int offset)
      Move the whole grid left or right
      Parameters:
      offset - Offset of the movement : -1 for right and +1 for left
      Returns:
      false if the movement is impossible, true if the movement has been made

    • moveVertically

      public abstract boolean moveVertically​(int offset)
      Move the whole grid up or down
      Parameters:
      offset - Offset of the movement : 1 for right and -1 for left
      Returns:
      false if the movement is impossible, true if the movement has been made
